entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -16.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thompson Airport 02:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -16.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -19.2°C
Wind: NE 24 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
